barabasy69 wrote:
>
> Hi everybody,
>
> What is the best way to: pause a job/shutdown server/restart
> server/resume job? I paused a job today and shutdown the server.
>






Shutting down the crawler kills all context -- unless you 'save' the 
current state by running a 'checkpoint' before stopping the job (or 
running 'shutdown').  See Section 9.4, Checkpointing in the user manual: 
http://crawler.archive.org/articles/user_manual.html#checkpoint.
